quest.name: Little Lady Adventurer
journal:
Elyne is gazing at you with expectant eyes.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Elyne explains to you her favor: she would ask that you act as her escort, so that her parents will permit her to travel with Kupka Kupp on his mission to Ul'dah. After agreeing to her request, it is decided that your little group will assemble for departure at the Gridanian airship landing.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

You meet with an elated Elyne at the airship landing and board the airship together. As she struggles to contain her excitement, the ever-dutiful Kupka explains that they must first pay a visit to the royal seneschal at the Ruby Road Exchange.

Upon your arrival, you make straight for the Ruby Road Exchange and the royal seneschal. Just before the Songbirds arrive to accept their fan letters, however, Astrid delivers a missive of her own─it seems that Lisette would take advantage of the close timing of Valentione's Day and Little Ladies' Day to host a joint event of some kind. It is then that Elyne suggests that the performers don Valentione-styled costumes, a proposal which is received enthusiastically by all involved. An excited Astrid immediately offers to return to Gridania to make the necessary arrangements. In the meantime, the seneschal wonders if you would be willing to lend him a helping hand...

You indicate your willingness to help, and the royal seneschal outlines his errand─a simple delivery to Frondale's Phrontistery. Once there, he asks that you seek out Lady Aldiytha in the children's ward and place the package in her hands.

Elyne, giddy at her first adventurer-like task, discovers that her delivery was actually a gift of sweets for the patients of the children's ward. Lady Aldiytha encourages her to help hand them out, and Elyne and Kupka enjoy spending time with some newly made friends. With the job complete, Kupka suggests you return to the seneschal and see if Astrid has arrived with the costumes.

The seneschal informs you that Astrid has indeed returned and is helping the Songbirds into their new outfits. You accompany Elyne to the stage and, following the performance, the three singers impart some words of wisdom to the would-be adventurer. It is almost time for the young lady to head home...

Although ready to leave, Elyne is already making plans for her next trip to Ul'dah. As you prepare to board the airship, however, Astrid mentions that Lisette would like to see everyone at the amphitheatre upon your return to Gridania.

You duly report to Lisette, and Elyne thanks you all effusively for making her dreams come true. Astrid and Kupka, too, are grateful for the experience, learning as they have that there is more to being an emissary than either one imagined. Pleased with her pupil's growth, Lisette reassures everyone that Valentione's Day─and the opportunity to spread more love and affection─is far from over!
objectives: Wait at the airship landing in Gridania at the designated location.
Speak with the royal seneschal at the Ruby Road Exchange.
Speak with the royal seneschal once more.
Enter the children's ward at Frondale's Phrontistery and speak with Aldiytha.
Speak with the royal seneschal at the Ruby Road Exchange.
Speak with Lisette at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: You'll help me, then? Oh, thank you, Forename!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: More than anything right now, I want to join Kupka on his trip to Ul'dah.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: The problem is, I'm afraid my parents will be too worried to let me go. But if they knew that you were going with me...

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: This could be your first step on the road to adventure!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: So you're saying you'll come!? Wonderful! Oh, I have to tell my parents right away!

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: I shall be right behind you when you do, a voice of steady reassurance!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I, too, would like to see this tale to its conclusion. One can hardly abandon the ship of love ere it docks safely in the harbor!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Before we leave for Ul'dah, however, I should report to Lisette the reason for my continued absence. Let us convene at the airship landing when we are ready to depart!

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: I really must deliver these letters...but I am curious to hear the nature of this favor, kupo!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Elyne is happy and our work is done. Or so I thought! Pray lend the young lady your ear, Forename.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: They said yes! Kupka helped me convince them!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Wonderful! And might I say, you look very smart in your traveling clothes!

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: Yes, it is all very exciting, but let us not forget your promise to return within the agreed-upon time, kupo! All aboard for Ul'dah! Once we arrive, I must speak with the royal seneschal at the Ruby Road Exchange.

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: Elyne seems to be enjoying herself, kupo! Perhaps we can see more of the city once I've tended to my duties.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Such a big and noisy place! And look at all these buildings! Do they make everything out of stone, here?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: In case you were wondering, Little Ladies' Day was close to overlapping with Valentione's Day this year, so they decided to go ahead with the former here in Ul'dah to avoid a collision of festivals.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Oho! We meet again, madamsir! You have been keeping well, I trust?

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Well met, adventurer! I am the royal seneschal, and it is my great pleasure and privilege to oversee the joyous events of Little Ladies' Day.

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: My dear seneschal, how time does pass us by, kupo! I come once more, bearing letters of love for the Songbirds.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: And how eagerly do they await your arrival, dear Kupka! Our lovely ladies are presently occupied with rehearsals for their upcoming performance, but they should be back any moment. ...Ahem, are these fine people all your assistants?

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: Ah, how remiss of me, kupo! Allow me to make the introductions...

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: But isn't this fitting! Why, it's as if Forename is acting as seneschal for this darling young princess!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Yes! Exactly! And even as a Little Ladies' Day wish is coming true, so, too, are we fulfilling a mission of love for Valentione's Day. Two wonderful celebrations, joyfully coinciding...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: ...Oh, which reminds me! I have a missive here for you from Lisette, our eminent emissary of romance and affection.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: ...Hmmm. Seeing as our respective festivals are set to take place at much the same time, the Lady Valentione proposes a joint event of some manner.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: This is indeed a rare opportunity, and one too precious to be squandered. But what might be suitable, I wonder...

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: (-???-)By the gods, I need a bath! But I'd say we're all ready for the big show!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Ah, ladies! Kupka Kupp is here with your mail.

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: I have a bundle for each of you, kupo!

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: I thought for certain I would have the biggest pile this time! Why is it we always receive the exact same number of fan letters!?

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: Well, I think it's nice... We're all equally loved!

dialogue.name: MASHAMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: Besides, it's about the content, not the quantity. All those words of admiration and encouragement...

dialogue.name: MASHAMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: This fan writes, “I can hardly wait to see your next performance, not to mention your newest outfits.” ...Gods, we haven't even decided what to do with our costumes.

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: “A new look for a new us” was the idea, but if we don't come up with something soon, we'll be taking to the stage in what we're wearing now.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: What about the Valentione's Day costumes? I think they're really adorable!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Elyne! That's a splendid idea! We could easily sew the same pattern using fabric in the Songbirds' signature colors─red, blue, and yellow.

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: That is a splendid idea. A dash of Valentione flavor to spice up a Little Ladies' confection! It'll be the talk of the town!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Well now, it would seem Lisette's desire for a joint event has found its answer.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Indeed! I shall return to Gridania to arrange the costumes and report the good news.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Pray take your ease, ladies. I will inform you once the new outfits have arrived.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: And what are your own plans? If you aren't otherwise occupied, might I ask for a helping hand whilst you await the return of your companion? There would be no rush─you could even complete the task as you take a tour of the city. What say you?

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: Would you like to know why the Songbirds always receive an equal number of fan letters? Me too, kupo...

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: I wonder what kind of task the seneschal wants us to do. Let's ask him!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: It is a simple errand, really: I've a single delivery that I should like you to make to the children's ward at Frondale's Phrontistery.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: We're to be trusted with a delivery!? I feel like an adventurer already!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Oho, you've set your sights on becoming an adventurer, have you? Well then, Mistress Elyne, we must reward you accordingly: whatever portion of my delivery remains “unclaimed” shall be yours to keep. How does that sound?

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Y-You can count on me, sir! Um...what is this “children's ward” exactly, anyway?

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: From what I understand, 'tis a place where little ones around your age are sent to recover from illness, kupo.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: There will be a lady there by the name of Aldiytha. Put the package directly into her hands, if you please.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Yes, sir! On our way, sir!

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST03850
dialogue.text: A delivery from the royal seneschal, is it? The children's ward is right through here.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Enter the children's ward?

dialogue.name: ALDIYTHA
dialogue.text: ...I see! Well, you have my thanks, my little adventurer, as do your friends.

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: If I may ask, Lady Aldiytha, where are all the children? I hadn't expected the ward to be so quiet, kupo...

dialogue.name: ALDIYTHA
dialogue.text: They're with the physicians, undergoing a scheduled examination. We put up decorations whilst they're away, you see, ready to surprise them upon their return!

dialogue.name: ALDIYTHA
dialogue.text: These sweets you've brought us from the seneschal are part of the celebrations. Perhaps you might like to stay and help hand them out?

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Oh! I would like that very much!

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: Handing out sweets is an act of love, and very much in keeping with Valentione's Day tradition. As an emissary, it would be my duty and my joy, kupo!

dialogue.name: DAMIELLIOT
dialogue.text: I was aware of plans to decorate the ward, but I did not expect we would be welcoming such delightful visitors as well.

dialogue.name: DAMIELLIOT
dialogue.text: Look how happy the children are to meet Mistress Elyne and Master Kupka. It is not often they get to make new friends of their own age, not to mention a different city, so this is quite a special occasion.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Lady Aldiytha gave me the leftover sweets as a reward! I guess that means we finished the job the seneschal gave us.

dialogue.name: ALDIYTHA
dialogue.text: And a fine job it was. I shall be staying here with the children for a time, so might I ask that you convey my regards to the seneschal?

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: Of course! We should be getting back in any case, kupo! Astrid will surely have returned by now.

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: I don't see Astrid, kupo...

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: We should tell the seneschal we made his delivery...shouldn't we?

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Thank you for delivering that most important cargo. And how is the Lady Aldiytha? Will she be joining us for the festivities?

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: She said she needed to stay with the children for the moment. Oh, but she did let me have the rest of the sweets, just like you promised!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: But of course! It is only fair you be paid for services rendered.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: As for your companion, Mistress Astrid returned a short while ago with the promised costumes, and is assisting the Songbirds with the fitting. The ladies will be mounting the stage momentarily─you'll stay to watch their performance, of course?

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: Ladies and gentlemen! Welcome, and thank you for coming to our concert!

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: Valentione's Day festivities are in full swing, and now, here in Ul'dah, Little Ladies' Day has taken over the city! This is our chance to have double the fun!

dialogue.name: MASHAMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: Have you all noticed our Valentione-themed costumes? This performance is dedicated to the ideals of both festivals, and we mean to give our emissary friends a run for their money! Prepare to feel the love!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: The Songbirds are so amazing...and pretty...and lovely!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: It's no wonder they're so popular! With the way they can stir people's hearts, we may have to appoint them as honorary emissaries...

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: I certainly feel inadequate after that performance, kupo. Perhaps I'm not as wise in the ways of love as I thought.

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: Did you see how much the crowd loved our outfits, Elyne!? We have you and your friends to thank for that!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: I was just saying how pretty you three looked. I'm so glad it went well!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: I don't know when, or even if, I'll ever be a real adventurer, but this trip to Ul'dah felt like a great start─going on a journey, and helping out the seneschal...

dialogue.name: MASHAMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: Oh, you want to be an adventurer? You must be very brave!

dialogue.name: MASHAMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: Chasing a dream is no easy feat, especially ones that take a great deal of training and dedication. Sometimes they seem so far away...but we reach for them all the same, don't we?

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: That's because having a dream is the best thing there is! Sure, there'll be times when you feel it's all too hard, but remember to keep that fire inside burning bright!

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: Exactly! And don't you ever say “if”! Stick with “when”! Your dream will always be there, waiting. Put one foot in front of the other, and you'll get there in the end.

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: Praise yourself whenever you make it even one step further than the day before. That's what I do! It builds confidence, and helps you stay positive.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: I will! Thank you...all of you.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: I'll never stop chasing my dream...

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: We had best be getting Elyne back home, kupo! Her parents will be expecting her!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: “Your dream will always be there, waiting.” Now isn't that a reassuring thought?

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: I suppose I better be heading home...but when I next come to Ul'dah, I'll have to bring some Twelveswood flowers for the children's ward.

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: I'm sure they would love that, kupo! And it would be nice to have a longer chat with our new friends.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Shall we board the airship, then? Lisette wished to see us upon our return, so pray join me at the amphitheatre if you have time.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Welcome back, everyone! Our dear Astrid explained all the excitement when she came to arrange the costumes.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: I am so pleased to see you lifted out of that gloomy mood, Elyne! And I really must thank you for your excellent suggestion!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Oh, Lady Lisette, you should have seen the Songbirds in their Valentione outfits─they were adorable!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename. I never would have braved any of this if it weren't for you!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Now, if an adventurer helps you, you're supposed to give them a reward. I'll have to ask Mother and Father what we can spare...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Your kind words were enough.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Don't worry about it. It was nothing.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Forget about it for now...

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Hm? You mean my letter!? But that was only─ That hardly seems fair!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: It wasn't nothing! I will repay you for this! Someday...

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Fine. But only for now! Once I start making my way in the world, I'll repay you for everything!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: ...Well, I really should be going now. Please know that I'll never forget this for as long as I live!

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: Thank you, Kupka, for encouraging me to write that letter. I always enjoy our talks in the wood.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: And thank you, Astrid, for staying with me until the end! I'll come to see you as often as I can before Valentione's Day is over.

dialogue.name: ELYNE
dialogue.text: And I can never thank you enough, Forename! I dream of the day we can travel together again!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I know I was on a mission of love for Elyne, and yet somehow I feel I gained as much from the experience as she did.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I thought I understood what being an emissary was all about, but there is so much more. You were right, Lisette─I was trying to dash through the garden, when I should have stopped to count the petals...

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Well, that's one way of putting it. But at least now you know what you don't know, and that's at least two-thirds of the journey!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: If I could bring as much joy as even one-third of the Songbirds, I would be happy!

dialogue.name: KUPUKAKOPP
dialogue.text: Well, I shall be learning right alongside you, Astrid. It wouldn't do to have a fledgling outdo me, kupo!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Fear not, my eager emissaries! Valentione's Day is not over yet, and there's still plenty of love to spread around!
